org.nodes.models

Class MotifSearchModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nodes.models.MotifSearchModel

  • public class MotifSearchModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A copy of the motif model that searches for a good subselection in the available instances.
    Author:
    Peter
